templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://thehappyplanner.com/apps/aftership

templates.name: I'm trying to redeem my points for products and I'm getting an error
templates.content: Please note that all Be Happy Boxes, products labeled as exclusive and certain sale items are not eligible for redemption. Really sorry about that!

templates.name: Price adjustment request
templates.content: Sorry, we do not offer a Sale or Promotional price-matching service. As a result, we're unable to accommodate requests to apply offers that were not available on the day the order was originally placed.

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content:
Our headquarters are at 6261 Katella Ave, Suite 150
Cypress, CA 90630.

templates.name: No promotion available
templates.content: I don't have any codes available at the moment, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out! In the meantime, you can check out our sales collection here: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Can coupon codes be used on Amazon?
templates.content: Unfortunately, Amazon and our website are completely separate and our coupons and promo codes are only valid on our own website.

templates.name: How to use reward points
templates.content: Once you've logged in to your account and have added items to your cart, you can apply your rewards at "checkout". It will let you know how many points you have, and there's also a drop down to select how many points to redeem.

templates.name: Undated planners (12 months)> Winter Collection release
templates.content: You can check those out here: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/undated

templates.name: July-start planners (18 months)> Spring Collection release
templates.content: You can check those out here: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/july-start-2022-2023-planners/duration_18-month

templates.name: Any Teacher layout planners in the Villains Collection?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we don't make Teacher layout planners in the Villains Collection. But here are all the teacher layout planners we offer: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/teacher-student-layout/layout_teacher

templates.name: What are the dimensions of items labeled Big?
templates.content: Items labeled as Big are 8.5x11!

templates.name: Do you offer price matching?
templates.content: We do not currently offer a price matching service on our site. Sorry about that!

templates.name: Store location
templates.content: Our approved vendors include Office Depot, Staples, Target, and Walmart! Feel free to check us out there.

templates.name: Do you ship Disney products internationally?
templates.content:
As much as we would love to, Disney's licensing agreement does not allow us to ship Disney items internationally. 
You will be able to add Disney items to your cart; however, upon checkout orders with international delivery addresses will receive a message stating that we do not offer shipping services to the address listed.
However, we are Happy to announce that Disney Licensed products can now be shipped to Canada.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://thehappyplanner.com/pages/return-policy

templates.name: July-start planners (12 months)> Spring Collection release
templates.content: You can check those out here: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/july-start-2022-2023-planners/duration_12-month

templates.name: Will you have January-start 12 month planners that start in 2023?
templates.content: Those will be released for our Fall Collection which will be sometime around September. Keep an eye out!

templates.name: Happy rewards
templates.content: Joining Happy Rewards is easy! Just sign up or sign in with your email through the Rewards page: https://thehappyplanner.com/pages/rewards If you already have a customer account, you will automatically be enrolled in Happy Rewards, and you just have to log in. You get 20 points just for creating an account!

templates.name: How can I add paper to my Disc Bound planners?
templates.content: You can take a look at this video that will demonstrate how to add and remove the paper from our Disc Bound planners: https://happyp.attn.tv/sl/9b2ndB8z

templates.name: Will there be another teacher release? Rollout for the Teacher and Back to School collection launch?/Which is the only rollout for this year's collection?
templates.content: Our Teacher and Back to School Collection launch will be the only rollout this year for this collection as of now.

templates.name: Will I get points if I click to purchase on your site from another affiliate link?
templates.content: Yes, you will! And the affiliate/content creator you clicked the link to shop from will also earn their commission from their purchase! :)

templates.name: Damaged product
templates.content:
So sorry about that! Please send our Customer Happiness an email at customerservice@meandmybigideas.com with the following information:

Your name 
Address
Online order number or location of purchase
Photos showing the damage product with a note

 Our team is happy to assist you with this!

templates.name: Why can't I use my rewards at once?
templates.content: There are some conditions that apply when using your rewards. Your cart total must be equal to or greater than the rewards discount amount in order to apply. Also, please note that discounts cannot be combined with other offers, and will not stack during promotional offers. Reward redemption is also limited to 250 points or $25 per transaction, and some items will be excluded from earning or redeeming points. You can find out more about it here: https://happyp.attn.tv/sl/__AgoL-h

templates.name: Do rewards / points expire?
templates.content: If you're continually redeeming points or earning points by making purchases, your balance won't expire, however, after a period of inactivity of 6 months, your points will expire.

templates.name: When will your products be in stores?
templates.content: In regards to our retail partners carrying our products, they do vary. But some are starting to show up in stores. Typically they start to carry our products anywhere from 1-2 weeks after it launches on our website. But every retailer is different so please note that some products are only carried on our site as our retailers like Michaels and Joann don't pick up every product that we create. Our website will always have the biggest assortment of products and options to choose from!

templates.name: Can I fully customize my planner?
templates.content: You do have the option to purchase discs, covers and filler pages all separate to assemble a customized planner that works for you!

templates.name: Cancel/edit
templates.content: Unfortunately, we cannot add items to any orders once they're placed and payment is processed. We can however try to submit your order for cancellation so you can place a new order. Please let me know how would you like to proceed.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free ground shipping for orders over $75 within the contiguous US. Perhaps you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Shipping Costs / Price
templates.content: Our shipping costs vary depending on the method chosen and your location. Ground shipping is free for orders over $100, and $4.95 - $7.95 for all orders under $100 orders within the contiguous United States. FedEx 2-Day and Overnight shipping is also available within the contiguous United States starting at $14.95.

templates.name: Can I merge/combine my accounts and rewards?
templates.content: Unfortunately we cannot move over any points due to security reasons. Hopefully you can just redeem any points on either of the accounts and just continue to use the other! Hope this helps!

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page so you're notified the second it comes back in!

templates.name: What's the weight of the paper in the planners?
templates.content: We don't disclose the weight of our paper to prevent product imitations, apologies for the inconvenience!

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/the_happy_planner/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/planahappylife

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can sign up for our affiliate program here: https://thehappyplanner.com/pages/affiliate-program

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our 45-Day Happiness Guarantee here: https://thehappyplanner.com/pages/45-day-happiness-guarantee

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We do offer 15% off for military, first responders, teachers and nurses on our site through ID.me. You will have to click the verification button which you will find at checkout.

templates.name: Do you sell refills?
templates.content: We do sell refills but they are undated extension packs and come in 4 or 6 months. We currently don't have extension packs in horizontal, classic. We mainly have Vertical layouts. You can see them here: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/extension-packs/size_classic

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at customerservice@meandmybigideas.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://thehappyplanner.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Do you offer price adjustment?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we are unable to honor promotions if the order is not placed within the timeframe the promotion was being offered.

templates.name: Do you offer exchanges?
templates.content: We do not offer exchanges. You will have to reach out to our team first for a Return Authorization #. The best way to go about this is to email us directly at customerservice@meandmybigideas.com, live chat with one of our agents via the website or give us a call at (866) 913-3895. Our team is happy to assist you with this!

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@meandmybigideas.com, live chat with one of our agents via the website or give us a call at (866) 913-3895. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (866) 913-3895 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 5-7 business days, and we usually ship via FedEx or USPS. The delivery time will depend on the option chosen at checkout.
